allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d torvan-db -c "SELECT q.id, q.\"formName\", q.\"formType\", COUNT(c.id) as item_count FROM \"QcFormTemplate\" q LEFT JOIN \"ChecklistItem\" c ON c.\"templateId\" = q.id GROUP BY q.id, q.\"formName\", q.\"formType\" ORDER BY q.\"formType\", q.\"formName\";")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d torvan-db -c 'SELECT q.id, q."formName", q."formType", COUNT(c.id) as item_count FROM "QcFormTemplate" q LEFT JOIN "ChecklistItem" c ON c."templateId" = q.id GROUP BY q.id, q."formName", q."formType" ORDER BY q."formType", q."formName";')
